dmca.title: Single Parents protest Parentsworld's punishment
dmca.body:
Wehave not received anything - we have noticed that our listings in Google have been removed - We ask for them to be reinstated. WE HAVE NO MATERIAL ON OUR SITE TODATE FROM PARENTSWORLD.COM SITE. We ask for you to view our site pages and if you find anything from parentsworld please let me know.

I own the domain name www.singleparentsworld.co.uk
My slogan has always been: Because it's a Single Parents World!

I am sorry if there has been a clash of text between sites but I believe I am  within my rights to use this slogan for the good of OUR non-profit making Single Parents Club and I also believe this is just sour grapes on [private]'s because we are a better club with more members.

Further more, I dont believe our club should be punished for something that  unfortunately happened in our first 4 weeks of birth to the Internet.

Its nearly 2 years on and we have all learned a great deal about the workings of the Internet and sites etc.

Yours faithfully

[private]
Chairman
Single Parents Club
www.oneparentfamily.com
www.oneparentfamily.co.uk



NOTE: THIS NOTICE IS A RESPONSE BY ONEPARENTFAMILY.COM TO AN EARLIER NOTICE FROM PARENTSWORLD.COM.   -- CHILLING EFFECTS STAFF
